name: Thanksgiving Day Salad
author: HELLIPORT
summary: A time-honored Thanksgiving salad that's at our table every year. Sweet and slightly tart, it is a colorful addition to any feast.
ingredients: 1 (6 ounce) package strawberry flavored Jell-O® mix
directions: Boil the water and combine with the strawberry flavored gelatin mix in a medium bowl
Mix in the strawberries, cranberry sauce and pecans
Chill in the refrigerator 6 to 8 hours, or overnight
Place the molded gelatin mixture on a serving plate and surround the base with lettuce leaves
In a medium bowl, mix the cream cheese, sour cream, sugar and lemon juice with an electric mixer until well blended
Use this mixture as a topping for each serving of salad
